quality.lint_passed: N/A - Static HTML/JS, no build step
quality.code_review_notes: Static frontend implementation with no build dependencies

details.evidence: Implemented 4 KPI cards: Total Vulnerabilities, KEV Active Exploits, High EPSS (>70%), New This Week with live calculations
Table with 5 filters (vendor, severity, KEV, EPSS, search) and 6 columns (CVE ID, Vendor/Product, Severity, Status, Description, Published)
Chart.js implementation showing 30-day vulnerability trend with filter responsiveness
Space Grotesk font, custom color palette (primary blue, accent pink/cyan), glass-morphism panels, neon glow effects, grid background
All components (KPIs, chart, table, pagination) update in real-time based on active filters

features_implemented: 4 KPI cards with real-time metrics calculation
Filterable vulnerability table (vendor, severity, KEV, EPSS, search)
Table sorting by CVE ID, Vendor, CVSS, KEV status, Published date
Pagination with configurable rows per page (10, 20, 50, 100)
26 sample CVE entries with realistic data
Dark cyberpunk theme with neon effects
Tailwind CSS via CDN for styling

technical_decisions.decision: Use CDN for all dependencies (Tailwind, Chart.js, Google Fonts)
technical_decisions.rationale: No build step required, faster development, easier to deploy as static files
No backend integration required for MVP, simpler deployment, follows spec preference for lightweight solution
Mature library, good documentation, easy integration, supports responsive design
Sample dataset is small (26 entries), eliminates need for backend API, instant updates

technical_decisions.decision: Space Grotesk font for cyberpunk aesthetic
technical_decisions.rationale: Modern geometric sans-serif, tech-forward appearance, matches mockup design

spawned_processes.notes: No background processes required for static frontend

assumptions: Dashboard will be served via static file server or integrated into FastAPI application
Sample data represents realistic CVE structure for testing
CDN resources (Tailwind, Chart.js) are acceptable for production deployment
Browser-based testing is acceptable for MVP verification
technical_debt: No automated tests (Jest/Playwright) - manual testing required
Hard-coded sample data - needs API integration for production
No localStorage for filter persistence across sessions
No export functionality (CSV/JSON) - listed as nice-to-have in spec
future_work: Integrate with FastAPI backend via HTMX for server-driven updates
Connect to real NVD, CISA KEV, and EPSS APIs
Add detail view modal for individual CVEs
Create automated browser tests with Playwright
notes: Successfully implemented fully functional vulnerability dashboard matching spec and mockup design. All acceptance criteria met. Dashboard is ready for integration with backend services when available.
